篔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
“筼1”的繁体字。
竹名。

篔字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篔； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页893第30
【廣韻】【集韻】?玉分切，音雲。篔簹，竹名。【異物志】篔簹，生水邊，長數丈，圍尺五六寸，一節相去六七尺，或相去一丈，土人績以爲布。【戴凱之·竹譜】篔簹竹最大，大者中甑，筍亦中射筒，薄䏎而最長，節中貯箭，因以爲名。【柳宗元·柳州山水記】篔簹，湘湖閒皆有之。【蘇軾·文與可畫篔簹谷偃竹記】篔簹谷在洋州，與可甞令余作洋州三十詠，篔簹谷其一也。　又【集韻】干權切，音員。義同。于權切，音員。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　筼; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 893 30
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Jade split, sound cloud. Yundang, bamboo name. [Foreign Object History] Yundang, near the water, is several feet long, five or six inches long, six or seven feet away from one section, or ten feet away from each other, the natives think of cloth. 【Dai Kaizhi·Bamboo Spectrum】Yundang bamboo is the largest, the big one is in the zong, the bamboo shoots are also in the shooting tube, the thin and the longest, the knots are the longest, because of the name. [Liu Zongyuan·Liuzhou Landscapes] Yundang, Xianghu Lake is a leisure. [Su Shi·Wen and Can Painted Yundang Valley Yanzhu Record] Yundang Valley is in Yangzhou, and it is also one of the 30 chants of Yangzhou with the order of Koriao.　[Jiyun] Qian Quanqie, voice clerk. The same meaning. Yu Quanqie, sound engineer.
